target_name: 모든 지역에서 일어나는 모든 형태의 폭력과 관련 사망률을 상당 수준으로 감소
computation_definitions:
데이터 이용 제한(4유형)
현재 이용할 수 있는 국내통계, 국제기구통계, 국내유사통계가 없습니다.
1유형, 2유형, 3유형에 속하나 일시적으로 서비스가 되지 않는 경우도 포함됩니다.
indicator_definition: 분쟁관련 사망자의 총 수를 총 인구로 나눈 것으로, 인구 1십만 명당으로 표시됨
global_indicator_name: 인구 1십만 명당 분쟁관련 사망자수(성, 연령 및 사유별)
un_custodian_agency: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
title: Untitled
source_organisation_1: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)

en.target_name: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
en.computation_definitions:
Data unavailable (Type4)
There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
en.indicator_name: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
en.indicator_definition: The total count of conflict-related deaths divided by the total population, expressed per 100,000 population.
en.global_indicator_name: Conflict-related deaths per 100,000 population, by sex, age and cause
en.un_custodian_agency: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
en.title: Untitled
en.source_organisation_1: Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights (OHCHR)
